channel.title: How to add a npc that teleports you!
channel.description:
ok im currently working on a delta base and i need to add a npc in port sarim to teleport me to karamja. i took away all tele's and replaced to acutally city tele to make it more legit. so i need players to get to karamja for TzHaar. if u can also code the map that moves the ship while tele'ing id love that but for now i just need to add the npc to tele you thanks
Any Npc lets say uhm id=437 coords= X=2956,Y=3146

item.title: How to add a npc that teleports you!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

if (NPCID == 437) {
c.triggerTele(2956,3146,0);
}

If you are having trouble on understanding where this should go. Try searching some of the key syntax in the code above. If you find something that is similar to the one above, that would be the place to add this code snippet.

Read full topic
